<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Truespeech](/Feats.aspx?ID=2296) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Angelkin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1348)

</column>

---

It is paramount that you are understood and you understand others; language need not impede your message. You can cast [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) as a 5th-level divine innate spell once per day on yourself only. You gain a +1 status bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks for the duration of the spell when speaking to creatures with whom you already shared a language before casting.
name: Truespeech
